reviews.review_msg: The class happened online due to COVID 19. It was really bad in terms of quizzes. We had 11 quizzes, 10% each and he dropped the lowest 3, but still it took a lot of work to prepare for them, and there were a lot of uncertainties about the quizzes. Format was bad for the quizzes and he wasn't too flexible about it.
Provides no solutions to quizzes and assignments. Moves very fast, skip lectures, don't solve example in class, Tests are very hard, negative marking, gives less time on quizzes.

Great professor, if you read a bit before class it goes a long way with his style of lectures. Bahreyni gives you everything you need to succeed in the lectures and is available for questions. A bit disappointed grades were curved downwards but still a solid choice.

This prof is just really draconian in his policies. He needs to understand that in a post-covid world,  unannounced pop quizzes and mandatory attendance are disrespectful of our time, and not emailing about crucial test info is unacceptable in today's online world. It's 2025 - university doesn't work the same way it did back when he was in school.

The professor does not really understand the students. The professor knows his material but teaches it very poorly and shows little empathy towards students. Not very likable and a pain to be in his lecture. Too serious and too boring.
Did you get the point? No. I did not get the point .
Abid Ali has taught me the meaning of hatred
professor responds poorly to emails. I do not recommend emailing them for questions. Do so anonymously if you must.

there is no guide for how to learn the course material. Professor laughed at students during the exam and showed clear intent to attempt to fail students. Such as refusing to provide formulas, increasing the difficulty of exams unfairly, and constantly changing the quizzes during examination. Someone should teach this teacher how to teach.

First quiz was unsolvable until 30 minutes in when he changed the question to provide the required information. 
Fourth quiz was the most challenging quiz I have written to date - it's bad when people are handing in half-empty pages halfway into the quiz and leaving depressed. 
Required formulas are not provided. 

DO NOT TAKE 311 WITH ABID ALI

Please never approach this professor. He is the embodiement of a failed dictator turned professor. Never follows his syllabus. Throws temper tantrums and demands respect in the form of attendance from students by the use of pop attendance taking.

Once you set foot into Abid's class, nothing will be the same.

While the arbitrary deadlines that endlessly shift will test your sanity, 

His monotone lectures will break your spirit. 
And when someone in the class dares to miss his 7:31 Am deadline he punishes the WHOLE class with a harder quiz. 

I need a long walk off a short MEMS cantilever
Extremely incompetent, doesn't give formula for quizzes, even though he is suppose to. Demands respect but doesn't earn it. If you have to take him all the bestüëçüèª

Best way to describe him is a rude dead battery, his lectures are like listening to someone scrape their nails on a chalk board, unbearable tone, and just rambles. When asking questions especially on quizes he is extremely rude and toxic and you will get a backhanded insulting answer from him. He demands respect but does nothing to earn it.

By far the worst professor I've ever had. Very disorganized. Makes several mistakes during in-class quizzes and assignment solutions. Negative attitude. Zero accountability. Unprofessional. Unfair test conditions. Extremely boring lectures. Short-tempered. Unreliable. Extremely incompetent. Any time spent on this class is a waste of time.

Abid Ali is a standout as among the very worst professors I have ever had. In terms of teaching, his communication skills are unbelievably bad. Mistakes are prevalent throughout the course material, assignments, questions, and solutions. He fails to provide formulas for exams despite promising to. He's very disorganized and does not take feedback.

Demands that everyone be ready for the lecture exactly at the start of class time. Even if one person is speaking he starts yelling at them. Most of the time he himself is not ready for the lecture at the start

Early on, he gave us a choice on either writing cheat sheets ourselves or providing the formulas we would need. the class chose for him to provide the formulas needed. however, on most quizzes, he would not provide the formulas needed. Sometimes, he provided formulas during the quiz once he realized students would not remember the obscure formula

His due dates are at inconsistent times (11pm, 2pm, 9am, 1pm) for no reason. A student emailed after missing a 9am deadline, causing the professor to insult the class, calling them 'babies' for not putting in 'enough effort.' He then vowed to make the next quiz harder. Lectures are dull and uninformative, forcing students to watch Behrads lectures.

Blew up at the class about how nobody took the course seriously, and punished us for the minority of the classes mistakes by increasing the difficulty of quizzes, which wouldn't be a problem by itself... If he were able to provide quizzes that were solvable, but he would forget variables/formulas on the exam and give them to us with 15 minutes left

This is the professors first time teaching and you can tell, he expects people to take the class way more seriously than they do so anything he slightly dislikes causes him to get very annoyed. The quizzes aren't too bad but only when he actually writes them properly and gives the required formulas. Can't even get enough respect to quiet the class.

Absolute joke. Demands respect and attention but provides an insulting, unclear, and disorganized environment. Has a completely unreasonable and miserable attitude towards students, just rude and unprofessional. This is not a professor who wants to help students succeed and learn the content. Solutions are consistently wrong.
Where arrogance meets incompetence.

Awful, just awful. This prof is so bad that I had to write my first reivew here.Tests are unfathomly disorganized. Most posted solutions are wrong. He will throw temper tantrums and throw pop quizes to force attendance. Sometimes I wonder if he even understands what he is teaching us. Take 311 with Behraad if you can.

Lowkey mean asf, threatens you if you talk in his class even for a bit. Also not very good at teaching, or explaining. Monotone voice and harsh accent thats hard to understand. Makes a lot of mistakes when making quizzes that he has to constantly correct during the quiz.

I apologize to all profs I had before him. Lectures are horrible. He gets mad when students talk or dont pay attention. Threatens students with popquiz or takes student ID to minus exam marks. Called the class babies for 20 min. Changed his quiz multiple times during the quiz until last 10 minutes. Expects students to learn what he cant teach. Evil
